duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with counter sales and provide customer service
Answer customer questions regarding accounts, products, and services
Process orders, quote prices, and enter orders into the system
Communicate product features, benefits, and warranty policy information to customers
Upsell by identifying related products and add-on extensions
Ensure merchandise displays are stocked and clean

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma or GED preferred. Specialized skills training/certification may be required
